Import Proc

```{r}
library(haven)
meat <- read_sas("http://www.principlesofeconometrics.com/sas/meat.sas7bdat", 
    NULL)
meat
```
Data wrangle

```{r}

meat %>%
 filter(IN >= 383L & IN <= 469L) %>%
 filter(PL >= 22.5 & PL <= 27.3) %>%
 ggplot() +
 aes(x = QB, y = IN) +
 geom_boxplot(fill = "#9ecae1") +
 labs(x = "da", y = "dsf", title = "abcc", subtitle = "defd") +
 theme_minimal()
```
